DOC.brief_summary: In multi-centre randomized control trial investigator compare effect dyspnoea severity oxgen delivery High Flow Nasal cannula Low Flow Nasal Prongs child < 2 year age hospitalise bronchiolitis moderate-severe dyspnoea .
DOC.detailed_description: In multi-centre randomized control trial investigator compare effect dyspnoea severity oxgen delivery High Flow Nasal Cannula Low Flow Nasal Prongs child < 2 year age hospitalise bronchiolitis moderate-severe dyspnoea . The study take place pediatric ( Non intensive care ) unit 5 different hospital Netherlands .
DOC.criteria: bronchiolitis PEWS ( Pediatric Early Warning Score 028 ) > = 6 oxygen saturation < 92 % chronic lung disease hemodynamic significant heart disease syndromal disease facial abnormality
